description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Enhancements

EMAILNET-35055
Add auto recognition for pipelining mode based on response of 'capability' command .
EMAILNET-34884
Improve support of asynchronous operations with allowance pipelining for SMTP client
EMAILNET-34853
PersonalStorageQueryBuilder.Body.Contains NotSupportedException
EMAILNET-34968
Provision of Creating MapiCalendarTimeZone object from a Standard Timezone
EMAILNET-35047
Provision of adding MapiAttachment without a Name
EMAILNET-35051
EML with empty Content-Type to MSG raises exception
EMAILNET-35062
Extract attachments from PST messages without extracting complete message
EMAILNET-35063
PST: Get Parent FolderInfo from EntryId
EMAILNET-34884
Improve support of asynchronous operations with allowance pipelining for SMTP client.
EMAILNET-35054
Can't create Office 365 folder with "/" in name

EMAILNET-35038

EMAILNET-35040
MSG to MHTML renders wrong output
EMAILNET-35041

EMAILNET-35046

Invalid URI: The hostname could not be parsed. exception raised while adding EML to PST
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
